item.title: If You Lose Your PAN Card or Forget Your PAN Number
item.description: If You Lose Your PAN Card or Forget Your PAN Number From Birth to Death! Government Documents / Services - Guidebook If you have applied for PAN Card Apply, you will have to use that PAN number for the entire day. It is an offence under the Act to use multiple PAN cards. A fine will be imposed. In some cases, you may lose your PAN card. You may also have forgotten the PAN number of that PAN card.
